segment.source: Lock down Windows 10 (Windows 10)
segment.target: Lock down Windows 10 (Windows 10)

segment.source: Windows 10 provides a number of features and methods to help you lock down specific parts of a Windows 10 device.
segment.target: Windows 10 provides a number of features and methods to help you lock down specific parts of a Windows 10 device.

segment.source: Lock down Windows 10
segment.target: Lock down Windows 10

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 10 Mobile
segment.target: Windows 10 Mobile

segment.source: Enterprises often need to manage how people use corporate devices.
segment.target: Enterprises often need to manage how people use corporate devices.

segment.source: Windows 10 provides a number of features and methods to help you lock down specific parts of a Windows 10 device.
segment.target: Windows 10 provides a number of features and methods to help you lock down specific parts of a Windows 10 device.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Set up a device for anyone to use (kiosk mode)
segment.target: Set up a device for anyone to use (kiosk mode)

segment.source: You can configure a device running Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Enterprise, Windows 10 Education, Windows 10 Mobile, or Windows 10 Mobile Enterprise as a kiosk device, so that users can only interact with a single application that you select.
segment.target: You can configure a device running Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Enterprise, Windows 10 Education, Windows 10 Mobile, or Windows 10 Mobile Enterprise as a kiosk device, so that users can only interact with a single application that you select.

segment.source: Lock down Windows 10 to specific apps
segment.target: Lock down Windows 10 to specific apps

segment.source: Learn how to configure a device running Windows 10 Enterprise or Windows 10 Education so that users can only run a few specific apps.
segment.target: Learn how to configure a device running Windows 10 Enterprise or Windows 10 Education so that users can only run a few specific apps.

segment.source: The result is similar to a kiosk device, but with multiple apps available.
segment.target: The result is similar to a kiosk device, but with multiple apps available.

segment.source: For example, you might set up a library computer so that users can search the catalog and browse the Internet, but can't run any other apps or change computer settings.
segment.target: For example, you might set up a library computer so that users can search the catalog and browse the Internet, but can't run any other apps or change computer settings.

segment.source: Configure Windows telemetry in your organization
segment.target: Configure Windows telemetry in your organization

segment.source: Use this article to make informed decisions about how you can configure Windows telemetry in your organization.
segment.target: Use this article to make informed decisions about how you can configure Windows telemetry in your organization.

segment.source: Manage connections from Windows operating system components to Microsoft services
segment.target: Manage connections from Windows operating system components to Microsoft services

segment.source: Learn about the network connections that Windows components make to Microsoft and also the privacy settings that affect data that is shared with either Microsoft or apps and how they can be managed by an IT Pro.
segment.target: Learn about the network connections that Windows components make to Microsoft and also the privacy settings that affect data that is shared with either Microsoft or apps and how they can be managed by an IT Pro.

segment.source: Configure access to Windows Store
segment.target: Configure access to Windows Store

segment.source: IT Pros can configure access to Windows Store for client computers in their organization.
segment.target: IT Pros can configure access to Windows Store for client computers in their organization.

segment.source: For some organizations, business policies require blocking access to Windows Store.
segment.target: For some organizations, business policies require blocking access to Windows Store.

segment.source: Manage Wi-Fi Sense in your company
segment.target: Manage Wi-Fi Sense in your company

segment.source: Wi-Fi Sense automatically connects you to Wi-Fi, so you can get online quickly in more places.
segment.target: Wi-Fi Sense automatically connects you to Wi-Fi, so you can get online quickly in more places.

segment.source: It can connect you to open Wi-Fi hotspots it knows about through crowdsourcing, or to Wi-Fi networks your contacts have shared with you by using Wi-Fi Sense.
segment.target: It can connect you to open Wi-Fi hotspots it knows about through crowdsourcing, or to Wi-Fi networks your contacts have shared with you by using Wi-Fi Sense.

segment.source: The initial settings for Wi-Fi Sense are determined by the options you chose when you first set up your PC with Windows 10.
segment.target: The initial settings for Wi-Fi Sense are determined by the options you chose when you first set up your PC with Windows 10.

segment.source: Configure Windows 10 Mobile using Lockdown XML
segment.target: Configure Windows 10 Mobile using Lockdown XML

segment.source: Windows 10 Mobile allows enterprises to lock down a device, define multiple user roles, and configure custom layouts on a device.
segment.target: Windows 10 Mobile allows enterprises to lock down a device, define multiple user roles, and configure custom layouts on a device.

segment.source: Reset a Windows 10 Mobile device
segment.target: Reset a Windows 10 Mobile device

segment.source: There are two methods for resetting a Windows 10 Mobile device: factory reset and wipe and persist reset.
segment.target: There are two methods for resetting a Windows 10 Mobile device: factory reset and wipe and persist reset.

segment.target: Learn more
